scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --config ../firebase.json --only functions
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:rules
scripts.test:integration: firebase emulators:exec --project demo-skids-parent --config ../firebase.json --only firestore "vitest run --config vitest.config.ts test/integration.callable.test.ts"
scripts.test:rules: firebase emulators:exec --project demo-skids-parent --config ../firebase.json --only firestore "vitest run --config vitest.config.ts test/rules.test.ts"
